Detailed Description

A factory that loads FFMpegSources from file.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

FFMpegLoader::FFMpegLoader ( bool  setup = true  ) 

Sets up the libavcodec library. If you want to do your own setup, send a setup=false parameter.
